text: Orielton Lagoon is a lagoon near Sorrell, in the south-west of Tasmania. The lagoon has an area of . Usually it is only deep, so there are many wading birds, some of them also migratory. The lagoon is a nature reserve, protected by the Ramsar Convention. Category:Lagoons Category:Bodies of water of Australia Category:Geography of Tasmania
title: Orielton Lagoon
